title: I Want To Be Fooled
summary: Tensions are brewing under the seemingly calm surface of the Vasilios Empire, a kingdom ruled by the Imperial Family and the Temple. Lady Medea Solon has lost her place next to Crown Prince Eros, but resolves to do whatever it will take to win back what's rightfully hers. Will she reclaim her throne?

title: Which Wizard Will Kill Me
summary: Life at Papilon, the elite magic school, is full of hardships for Rhea who's failing in every possible way. One day, when her hidden friendship with the top-student and her childhood friend Sion gets discovered by the mysterious transfer student, Joon, Rhea can’t help but notice the energy of death surrounding him… Who will be the wizard to kill her?!

title: They Say i Was Born a King’s Daughter
summary:
After spending most of her youth fielding the attention of countless wealthy suitors, Suhee Kim finally finds true love with a steady boyfriend named Jinsu Han. But then tragedy strikes, and Suhee is murdered in cold blood.  
To Suhee's surprise, she is immediately reincarnated as a baby girl named Sanghee Kim, who just so happens to be a princess! Plus, she is fully conscious of her past life. There's just one problem: in this society, women are seen as totally inferior, even princesses. Appalled by the treatment of women, Sanghee is determined to change the kingdom's patriarchal ways. Will Sanghee be able to succeed, or will she be stuck living her second life being treated as a lowly woman?

title: If You Desire to Keep Me [Official]
summary: Kisa’s world shatters when she hears her fiancé Daniel has another woman. She confronts him, expecting denial but Daniel doesn’t just lie; he mocks her, calling her stupid. Betrayed and trapped by her father’s refusal to let her break the engagement, Kisa’s fate feels sealed until Seyodd, the new duke and her late brother’s replacement, steps into her life. A secret contract marriage with him becomes her only escape. Just when she thinks she’s found freedom, a chilling letter from Daniel warns her about Seyodd’s dangerous secret. What darkness is Seyodd hiding beneath his noble mask?

title: The Villainess’s Coffee Story
summary:
Lunaria il von Solfege. The protagonist, who was reincarnated as the villainess of her favourite game, was flooded with tragic memories of Lunaria. She was condemned, left alone and uncared for, and tried to commit suicide by stabbing herself with a dagger.

"Leave everything to me, Lunaria. Now that I'm Lunaria, I won't show them any mercy."

title: Start Invincible
summary: The weakest awakened one, Chu Mingxuan, is swallowed by a giant beast. On the brink of death, he unexpectedly inherits a system, thus embarking on a long journey of continuous strengthening towards godhood. But how are awakened ones formed, and where does the system come from? Beneath the calm surface, undercurrents surge, and the world’s bloody great revolution is about to begin.

title: Kissing Is a Violation of Contract
summary:
"Be my girlfriend."
Jae-hyun, a selfish tycoon, and Dan-bi, who has nothing but confidence to rely on.
They are entangled in a rainbow(?) relationship!
Will this 'contractual love affair' end safely?

title: The Secret Bedroom of a Dejected Royal Daughter
summary:
Princess Llewelyn, who was once an outstanding princess but was now miserably abandoned. An ugly curse has been placed upon her with no one to protect her. It is a curse that makes her lust for men. In order to stop her curse, Llewelyn opens her bedroom... Four men are entangled with the abandoned princess. Will the truth of the curse be revealed? And who will be the man who will end up with her?

---
**Notes:**
* *The Secret Bedroom of a Dejected Royal Daughter* is the official English title of the Korean novel.
* Naver changed the webtoon's rating from R15 to R19. The novel is still R15, it has never released as R19. Naver R19 rating for the webtoon is more of a mature R17.

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5575596), [Official English Translation](https://www.yonderstory.com/)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8614959), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=796867)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/beiqigongzhudemimifangjian/list?title_no=2297)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/secret-bedroom/list?title_no=4819)
* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/romance/the-secret-bedroom-of-the-abandoned-princess/list?title_no=4773)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0002369)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/the-secret-bedroom-of-the-abandoned-princess/list?title_no=4786)
* Alt. Official English: [Tappytoon (R19)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/the-secret-bedroom-of-the-abandoned-princess-m)

title: A S*ave Of Rubelfast
summary:
“Getting a job is the grave of life…” sighs Tanaka Makoto, an office worker belonging to a black guild, as he takes on a dungeon for work again today. 

One day, he makes a mistake in the broadcast settings for recording work, and broadcasts his dungeon capture to the whole country. A single blow from the Tyrant Dragon?! Tanaka, a sword master in the modern age, shows off his extraordinary skills, and the broadcast turns into a festival! 

"100 million concurrent viewers…?!"

Tanaka, who unexpectedly becomes an incredibly popular broadcaster, quits his black workplace and becomes an independent broadcaster. 

Now it’s time for work. The former corporate slave’s life of dungeon broadcasting begins!

title: It’s Okay If You Don’t Love Me
summary:
Comics Underground Japan presents the wild, subversive world of Japan’s most accomplished underground comics artists. Some of the dozen artists included in this anthology will be familiar to followers of manga; others make their American debut in these pages. The richly imaginative stories in this volume show a great range of graphic style, from painstakingly detailed craftsmanship to exuberant, maniacal renderings. At the heart of each work in this anthology is a unique personal vision and a fierce artistic compulsion–these manga artists are the misfits of the art form, and they are its visionaries.  
  
Included stories are:  
1. "Hell's Angel" by Yoshikazu Ebisu  
2. "It's All Right if You Don't Understand" by Yoshikazu Ebisu  
3. "Steel Pipe Melancholia" by Masakazu Toma  
4. "Future Sperm Brazil" by Takashi Nemoto  
5. "A Love Like Lemons" by Carol Shimoda  
6. "Selfish Carol's Summer Vacation" by Carol Shimoda  
7. "Mercy Flesh (Jiniku)" by Kazuichi Hanawa  
8. "Don Quixote #1 & #2" by Yasuji Tanioka  
9. "Planet of the Jap" by Suehiro Maruo  
10. "Mary’s Asshole" by Hanako Yamada  
11. "Volvox" by Pan Migawa  
12. "Bigger and Better" by Muddy Wehara  
13. "Laughing Ball" by Hideshi Hino  
14. "Cat Noodle Soup" by Hajime Yamano & Nekojiro

title: Dearest Fiancé, I Know You Despise Me [Official]
God-level Assassin, I’m the Shadow
summary:
In a world where people sleep and enter the realm abandoned by God, Qin Feng, who had sacrificed everything for his sister, is betrayed by her.
However, fate grants him a second chance, sending him back nine years before the abandoned world appears.
This time, Qin Feng chooses to abandon his sister and focus on becoming the strongest.

(Source: MangaUpdates)

title: The Lady Wants to Rest
summary:
The Noble Lady binds Tentacle Maid

Sharan, a pious girl, has secured a well-paying job as a maid. Her mission is to serve a prideful, sadistic noble lady named Lynette. However, her job won't simply be that easy....

title: Only Hope
summary: The night she witnessed her beloved husband involved in a murder, Eun-hye was murdered and time traveled nine years back to the day she first met him. Will she be able to put a halt to her husband's horrific killings? And, more importantly, will she ever be able to love again?

title: All Hail the Sect Leader
summary: All the members of my sect are abnormally strong. All my disciples turn out to be big shots, and I'll definitely become invincible in this world!

title: Best Actor in a Relationship Award
summary: Ji-eun, an aspiring director attending the nation's top art school. Ji-eun, who is unknown, wants to cast Jae-ha, the top student in the acting department, to make her work successful and make a name for herself at school. On the other hand, Jae-ha proposes a romantic relationship to Ji-eun in order to get rid of a senior he dislikes. Ji-eun, who is fooled by the acting genius, wants to complete both her school life and her love life. Will she be able to kill two birds with one stone?

title: See You, My King
summary: The martial arts master Chu Wenshan has lost his memories, but the only clue to finding out about himself is a threatening letter… Huh? My brother was kidnapped? Wait, who’s my brother? No, even if I don’t know, I have to rescue him. Excuse me my friend, have you seen my brother?

title: Battle of Mosol
summary: Win love! Win 500 million won! A competition begins where three single women in their thirties put 500 million won on the line to break free from being single. A princess without her prince, Gong Jurim, a trash collector, Kang Seon, and a firm believer in premarital purity, Kim Chaeyul! Who will be the ultimate winner of this singles showdown?

title: My Lover’s Personality Is a Little Strange
summary: After a fateful encounter as children, Evonne and the outcast prince, Theo, can’t deny their deep connection. However, their lives are torn apart when Evonne’s family is wrongly accused of treason, leading to their ruin. Cursed and forced to disguise herself as a man, Evonne struggles to survive until Theo finally finds her and uses all his power as emperor to take her with him. Together, they’ll start a journey facing challenges that’ll test their love as they try to start a life together.

title: The Male Lead’s Boyfriend is Obsessed With Me
summary:
I was transmigrated into a a dark and melodramatic BL novel.

Moreover, I became the villainess who was madly in love with the obsessive male lead, the boss of Baekcheon, and died in the first encounter with the main characters!

I thought about changing their love story, which ended with the death of my favourite schemer, into a happy ending!

"Let's go together, to my hell."

What? Did my favourite character just kidnap me?

"I like you,”'
“but this is too much.”

To ensure that the story unfolded just like it did the novel, I tried to seduce my favourite character just enough that he would hesitate to kill me.

"Why do you like me?"

But something feels off.

"Just try running away. That’s if you can, Princess."
"I’ve got my eyes on you right now, I'll go crazy if you do."

The male lead's boyfriend has started obsessing over me.

"Please, Yeonbyeol..."
"Don’t abandon me..."

So dangerous and dizzying, it's impossible to escape!

title: How a Villainess Survives as a Saint
summary:
Grimoire Alchemist is a dating sim popular among both boys and girls in Japan. The player’s rival in love, Claudia Ellington, is jokingly called the “Villainess of a Thousand Deaths.” But this alias of hers is actually no joke; she really does die a thousand times in the game!

Alas, our poor little protagonist ends up filling Claudia’s shoes when she gets reincarnated in the world of Grimoire Alchemist. Determined to escape the dire fate she has in store for her, Diehard Grimoire Alchemist Fan #1 (now the reincarnated Claudia) does everything she can to avoid entering the love interests’ romance routes in an attempt to separate herself from the game’s storyline and save her own skin. Despite her best efforts, she fails spectacularly as her love for the characters and game compendium of a brain lead to her pulling off impressive feats one after another.

Join her as she (much to her dismay) magnificently steals the hearts of the game's charming love interests!

title: When Rage Turns You Into the Female Lead
To Julie
summary: Julia Green is a teenager who lives in California alone. When she was feeling her loneliest, she unexpectedly encounters an unknown yet strikingly beautiful boy in her closet. Following that incident, whenever she was going through a rough time, William magically appears in her closet. For example, when she spent her birthday alone, on the night of a dance party she has to go to unaccompanied, or having to spend a sad dawn, he appears. Julia naturally ends up falling for William, who stood by her side in every tough moment... A magical love story that transcends time and space, where they have to fight to stand by each other.

title: Monster Eater
summary:
Rude is an adventurer who makes a living by collecting medicinal herbs in dungeons filled with miasma, relying on his unique skill [Abnormal Status Nullification]. Because of this, other adventurers avoid him because he smells like miasma, and he cannot form a party, so he is derided as a miasma diver. Then, a new labyrinth is discovered, and Rude is invited to join a party that needs him as a baggage carrier. In order to change the situation, he challenges the labyrinth. However, after encountering a powerful monster in the labyrinth, the adventurers who accompanied him betray Rude and abandoned him as a decoy...

After a life-or-death battle with the monster, he is injured, loses all his supplies, and is in a desperate situation. With the monster’s corpse lying before him, Rude tries to survive by gambling on the forbidden monster food...

title: Starting Over With the Dead You
summary: Getting reincarnated into the world of a novel is never easy, but possessing a doomed bride on her way down the aisle to marry a murderous emperor is just unfair! Now, the newly reincarnated Angelica has no choice but to learn to survive the whims of her new husband, Emperor Ranielo… Well, at least until he falls for his fated love interest and she can slip away unnoticed. But as the days pass, Ranielo’s interest in her only grows. Can this tyrant be tamed, or will Angelica find that some destinies can’t be unwritten?

title: Meet in The Middle
summary:
Despite being from a prestigious noble family, Bridget, a failed daughter who made a contract with the weakest spirit, one day had her engagement broken off by the third prince, Joseph.

However, no one sympathized with her, who was acting as a proud daughter at the behest of Joseph... At that time, Bridget meets the Duke's son Yuri, who is feared by those around him because of his overwhelming ability and cold personality.

Two people who hate each other and repel each other. However, the encounter gradually changes their destinies. This is the story of a villainess who is despised for being incompetent and a villain who is shunned for being a genius who eventually fall in love.

---
Despite her noble status, Brigitte contracts with the weakest type of spirit—and on that very same day, the prince publicly breaks off their engagement. No one shows much sympathy towards the once haughty young lady—except for the duke's son, Yuri, who attends the same magic academy. Yuri is feared for his incredible abilities and icy personality, but with him on her side, her fortunes might have changed…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426830814673), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9923hb/)

title: I Refuse the Regrets of a Traitor
Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: The Divine Witch Will Find Happiness with the God Hand of Ruin
I Reincarnated As The Crazed Heir
summary:
Once a rising martial arts master, Jagak Yang is known as the Ten Strike Finisher due to his ability to defeat any opponent within ten moves. Jagak is also the son of the leader of the Great Martial Alliance, an organization of virtuous martial arts sects. His future leadership over the martial arts world seems all but assured -- that is, until he is assassinated by jealous rivals! Jagak is reincarnated into the body of Cheonso Ma, the playboy second-in-command of the evil Shining Light Cult. Can Jagak remain true to his principles despite his new life on the dark side?

---

**Links:**
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/reincarnated-as-an-unruly-heir/list?title_no=3308)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/chongshengbuliangshaojiaozhu/list?title_no=1850)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001695)

title: Spirit of the Dead
summary:
After dying of sickness at 15, I had been reincarnated into the world of the MMORPG "War Chronicles of Desgarde"! The help feature taught me the basic summary of this world, but there seems to be additional secrets about me, aside from my reincarnation. Let's survive in this Isekai world to become the character I played in my previous life, a necromancer!

(Wait, there's a Necromancer King? What's that?!)

title: True Love of Mr. Wonderful
summary: Gong Jiu, a valkyrie of the apocalyptic era, transmigrated into the body of the white rose of the entertainment industry who was hated by many. On the day she arrived in the world, she unexpectedly saved the life of the cold King of the SIlver Screen, Bo Yibai! The cool and strong Alpha, straight actress X The cold, arrogant yet quiet Adonis of the masses. The two of them co-starred in a drama and went onto variety shows together as the arrival of Gong Jiu brought about a wave of interesting events in the boring entertainment industry! After Gong Jiu and Bo Yibai’s relationship was made public, the audience would always scream, “Help! The wife of the King of the SIlver Screen is ruining the variety show!”

title: I’m Pregnant, But I Won’t Marry Without Love
It’s Not The First Time
summary:
Third-year high school student Makoto Koga decides to confess to his crush, the school's most beautiful girl, second-year Saki Meguro. To his surprise, she agrees to date him. But what surprises him even more is her following words: "I'm not a virgin."

Unbeknownst to Koga, the surprisingly passive Meguro has the reputation of being the lascivious "easy girl" at school, not rejecting any boy that approaches her and having gone through multiple boyfriends. Will Koga persevere? Will he fare any differently than the rest? How will Meguro react to Koga, a boy who, for once, actually approached her before he knew of her reputation?

*Note: Was originally on Palcy (Kodansha platform for shojo manga), but also is on Magazine Pocket (Kodansha platform for shonen manga.)*

[Alternate official raw](https://palcy.kodansha.co.jp/c/1.html)

title: A Campus Romance, I Guess
summary:
An ordinary university student, Hayoon. She meets Kang-on on a trip for which she leaves on impulse. 

Kang-on falls in love at first sight with Hayoon and confesses to her but she rejects him. The two who thought they would never see each other again are reunited during a university club recruitment event...and end up joining the same club. But wait..the president of the club they joined likes Hayoon too?!

Lol this isn't made up but really just a campus romance...I guess.

title: Newcomers Turn Low at Night
summary:
With a handsome face and manners that would put a diplomat to shame, new hire Lee Hyeonu is a sight for sore eyes to Senior Manager Shin Iyeon when he walks through the doors of Hanshin Worldwide. 

Feeling like she’s won the lottery, Iyeon is looking forward to her company life alongside this polite and hard-working young man— 

"Hey, Iyeon. Get this done by tomorrow." 

Hyeonu is no regular employee; he’s the son of the CEO. And as he begins to show his true nasty nature behind closed doors, Iyeon begins wondering what she did to deserve him.

title: The Wild Rose Embraces the Frost
Marriage of Convenience 2: An Unforgettable Song
I Will Tame the Tormented Prince in this Life
The Corpse Will Tell
summary: Saku Kanakura was a boy born into a poor household. He studied hard and managed to pass the exam to an excellent high school but, it soon turned out that his parents were in debt! When it was time to pay the debt off, a mysterious gal appeared and offered to pay off their debt. A big burden was almost off Kanakura's head, but the gal made a condition in return which stated that—

title: The Reincarnated Scum Hunter
summary:
They died, reincarnated, and turned into monsters.
Now it’s time for someone to clean up the mess.

In a world plagued by reincarnators gone rogue—selfish, power-drunk degenerates who trample over lives and law alike—one man is tasked with bringing them to justice.

His name is Hasuda.
A lone enforcer from a secretive agency that specializes in tracking, neutralizing, and “retrieving” out-of-control isekai scumbags.
When Hasuda shows up, there’s no negotiation.
No second chances.
Only judgment.

With calm efficiency and overwhelming strength, he strips these reincarnated tyrants of their power… and delivers their punishment in the shadows.

It’s an underworld fantasy where might doesn’t make right—
because the clean-up crew has arrived.

title: I’ll Twist The Neck of a Sweet Dog
summary:
Chloe Garnache is an alluring trap for the emperor. 

After living a life full of abuse at the hands of her family, Chloe is finally freed from her torture by the grand duke, Kairos Ludwig. 

However, her days of getting taken advantage of are far from over. The only reason Kairos took her in is because of her beauty, which he plans to use in order to lure and kill the emperor. Chloe willingly follows Kairos’ orders, having fallen for his kind and gentle gestures. Unfortunately, her feelings are never returned, and she is met with a pitiful death once her task is fulfilled. 

But just when things seem to be over, Chloe awakens to find herself back before her life came spiraling down. And this time, she won’t be swayed by the sweet words of the devilish grand duke…

title: They Live in the Princess’ Flower Garden
summary:
In this new life Ibelia just wanted to be loved but she was born with the talent of a master of spirits, thanks to the seal of the king of spirits. She receives unconditional love from her parents and siblings, and is constantly chased by knights who want to be her guards. Furthermore, she also attracts the attention of several powerful men, who have ambitious plans for her. 

One of them is Ashrath, the king of demons and the only dragon in the other world, who wants to make her his bride. Another is Lelian, her childhood friend and the future emperor, who promises to build her an empire. And there are still others who hide their secrets and intentions. Ibelia will have to deal with them all, while walking along the flower path of an irresistible girl.

title: After Becoming Financially Free, They Offered Their Loyalty
summary: Shen Yuan, handsome and rich, became a second-generation loser and was mercilessly abandoned by his money-worshipping girlfriend after his family’s business shut down. However, because of this, he obtained the [Perfect Life] system. As long as he spent money on the opposite sex with a favorability of 60, he could receive double the amount back. From that moment on, he made full use of the system to win the hearts of beautiful women and earn a fortune. The more he spent, the richer he became. He spent money like water and rose to the top 0.1%, living a happy entrepreneurial life filled with endless passion
